job_tasks.phrase: Build and improve our web interface using Vue 3.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase describes the core task of developing and enhancing a user interface, which is a fundamental software development activity.

job_tasks.phrase: Create interactive pages that connect smoothly with our AI services powered by Large Language Models (LLMs) and NLP.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the integration of AI services into a web application, a key aspect of software integration.

job_tasks.phrase: Collaborate with your teammates to shape a clean and effective design.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to the collaborative design process within a software development context, focusing on user experience and interface structure.

job_tasks.phrase: Work with ML engineers and back-end developers to bring AI features to the front-end, making advanced tools easy to use.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly states the integration of AI features into the front-end, requiring collaboration with other development roles.

job_tasks.phrase: Explore new technologies and approaches to keep our platform modern and user-friendly.
job_tasks.justification: This describes the continuous improvement and modernization of a software platform, a common software development task.

job_tasks.phrase: Experiment with different ideas to find what works best.
job_tasks.justification: This refers to iterative development and experimentation within the software engineering process to optimize functionality.

job_tasks.phrase: Ensure the interface is fast and responsive, even when many users are online, so everyone enjoys a smooth experience.
job_tasks.justification: This task focuses on performance optimization and ensuring scalability of the user interface, which are core software engineering concerns.

job_tasks.phrase: use your front-end skills to help shape the future of AI-powered business tools.
job_tasks.justification: This phrase connects the technical role to a broader business objective of shaping future tools, indicating an understanding of business impact.

job_tasks.phrase: Drive & Lead: We encourage the entrepreneurial spirit and are self-managed to be able to quickly grasp opportunities.
job_tasks.justification: This directly mentions entrepreneurial spirit and self-management, aligning with innovation and ownership.

job_tasks.phrase: Grow & Learn: We keep evolving our innovation capabilities and help you to get the best out of yourself, both professionally and personally.
job_tasks.justification: This emphasizes continuous growth and learning, fitting the adaptability category.

job_tasks.phrase: Together & Care: We love working together. We stimulate collaboration with utmost respect for each other regardless of gender, age, background, or beliefs.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly highlights collaboration and working together.

job_tasks.phrase: Speed & Change: We are an agile and dynamic organization, that keeps adapting and knows how to respond to opportunities or change.
job_tasks.justification: This describes an agile and adaptive organization, implying a need for adaptability in its employees.

job_tasks.phrase: You're an ambitious problem-solver, passionate about pushing the boundaries of AI and software development.
job_tasks.justification: This directly states the need for problem-solving skills and a passion for pushing boundaries.

job_tasks.phrase: You thrive in a fast-paced environment and are eager to shape the future of AI-driven automation.
job_tasks.justification: Thriving in a fast-paced environment and eagerness to shape the future implies adaptability and a forward-looking mindset.

job_tasks.phrase: Level up your skills: Udemy, CM Academy, and exclusive Meetups with thought leaders to ensure you're always learning and growing.
job_tasks.justification: This explicitly mentions opportunities for learning and skill development.

profile.rationale: The job ad focuses heavily on front-end development tasks (Macro-Category A), specifically building and improving a web interface, integrating AI services into it, and ensuring its performance and user experience. While it mentions AI technologies like LLMs and NLP, the core responsibilities are centered around the software engineering aspects of creating the user-facing application. There are no tasks described that involve model development, fine-tuning, prompt engineering, or RAG implementation (Macro-Category B). Therefore, the role is classified as an AI-Adjacent Software Engineer, as it builds software that directly uses AI features but does not focus on the AI model development itself.

confidence.reasoning: The job ad is very clear about the role being a Front-end Developer focused on building an interface for an AI platform. The responsibilities are well-defined and clearly fall under software development and integration, with no significant AI specialization tasks mentioned. The distinction between building the interface for AI services and developing the AI services themselves is clear.
